title: Registration
content:
Please complete the following four simple steps to register by April 15th, 2023, registration closes on June 5th, 2023:

Step 1: Complete Registration Form (youth and adults): Registration Form

Step 2: Complete Trek Contract (youth only): Trek Contract

Step 3: Complete Medical Consent Form (youth and adults): Medical Consent Form

Step 4: If your Medical Consent form lists any medical conditions, you must print the Medical Release Form, obtain your doctor's signature, and email the form to heightstrek2023@gmail.com (youth and adults): Medical Release Form
